attributes.long-description:
The chart-topping hidden object game is now available in the PlayStation®Store! Travel back to 1880’s London to help Scotland Yard's detectives solve the crime of the century. Challenge your observation skills in numerous atmospheric 3D locations with oodles of objects to find. Was Jack a doctor, a royal prince, a barber, or something else? Once you start your investigation, you will be on an adventure you won’t want to stop!

Key features:
• Immersive story with 5 crimes to solve
• Interactive journal to keep track of your discoveries
• More than 30 locations to investigate
• Hundreds of Hidden Objects to spot
• 6 mini games
• 2 difficulty modes: Rookie (no time limit) and Detective (time limited)
• Interactive hints when you're stuck
• Various endings supported by Historians' theories

One-time license fee for downloads to up to 2 console systems and 2 portable systems that are associated with the purchasing account.
attributes.name: Actual Crimes: Jack The Ripper
